Common.nmake_head:
# Common project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\Shared\Common FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 REF = /lib:$(FRMWRK)\ /reference:System.dll,System.Data.dll,System.Xml.dll DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\Common.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.Common.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\Common.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.Common.xml

DAL.nmake_head:
# DAL project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\Shared\DAL FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 DREF = /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\Common.dll # debug project references RREF = /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\Common.dll # release project references REF = /lib:$(FRMWRK)\ /reference:System.dll,System.Data.dll,System.Xml.dll #system references DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\DAL.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.DAL.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\DAL.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.DAL.xml

DataAccess.nmake_head:
# DataAccess project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\DataAccess FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 REF = /lib:$(FRMWRK)\ /reference:System.dll,System.Data.dll,System.Web.dll,System.Xml.dll #system references REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSP.WebControl.dll DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.DataAccess.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.DataAccess.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.DataAccess.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.DataAccess.xml

WebControl.nmake_head:
# WebControl project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\WebControl FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 #C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.0.3705\ COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe NANTCONTRIB = D:\apps\NantContrib85.2004.07.06\bin
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 LIB1 = /lib:$(FRMWRK)\ #system references REF1 = /reference:System.dll,System.Data.dll,System.Design.dll,System.Drawing.dll,System.Web.dll,System.Windows.Forms.dll,System.Xml.dll REF = $(LIB1) $(REF1) REF = $(REF) /reference:$(SLNDIR)\Web\bin\DBauer.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarGrid.dll DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSP.WebControl.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.WebControl.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSP.WebControl.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.WebControl.xml
WebControl.nmake_foot:
debug: $(COMP) $(TARGET) $(DREF) $(REF) $(DEBUG) $(FILES)
release: $(COMP) $(TARGET) $(RREF) $(REF) $(RELEASE) $(FILES)
#slingMAKE: # $(NANTCONTRIB)\SLiNgshoT.exe -nmake -sln $(PRJDIR)\WebControl.csproj -map http://localhost/ D:\webprojects\
slingMAKE: $(NANTCONTRIB)\SLiNgshoT.exe -nmake -sln "D:\jcaesar\My Documents\Visual Studio Projects\TEMP\TEMP.SLN" -map http://localhost/ D:\webprojects\

Business.nmake_head:
# Business project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\Business FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 DREF = /lib:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\ /reference:Common.dll,DAL.dll # debug project references RREF = /lib:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\ /reference:Common.dll,DAL.dll # release project references REF = /lib:$(FRMWRK)\ /reference:System.dll,System.Data.dll,System.Xml.dll #system references DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\Business.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.Business.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\Business.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.Business.xml

QSPFulfillment.nmake_head:
# Web project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\Web FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe RESGEN = resgen
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 /fullpaths REF = /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Business.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Common.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\DAL.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\DBauer.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarGrid.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Microsoft.ReportingServices.Interfaces.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Microsoft.Samples.ReportingServices.CustomSecurity.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Microsoft.Web.UI.WebControls.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\QSP.WebControl.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\QSPFulfillment.DataAccess.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(PRJDIR)\bin\skmMenu.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Data.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Design.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Drawing.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Web.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Web.Mobile.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Web.Services.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Windows.Forms.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Xml.dll
DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\QSPFulfillment.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.Web.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\QSPFulfillment.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.Web.xml

skmMenu.nmake_head:
# skmMenu project make file, QSPFulfillment Project
SLNDIR = D:\webprojects\QSPFulfillment PRJDIR = $(SLNDIR)\Menu FRMWRK = C:\WINNT\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v1.1.4322 COMP = $(FRMWRK)\csc.exe RESGEN = resgen
TARGET = /target:library /warn:4 /fullpaths REF = /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Data.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Drawing.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Web.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Xml.dll REF = $(REF) /reference:$(FRMWRK)\System.Design.dll DEBUG = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\skmMenu.dll /debug:full /filealign:4096 #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Debug\QSPFulfillment.skmMenu.xml RELEASE = /out:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\skmMenu.dll /optimize+ #/doc:$(PRJDIR)\bin\Release\QSPFulfillment.skmMenu.xml
skmMenu.nmake_foot:
debugComp: $(COMP) $(TARGET) $(REF) $(DEBUG) $(FILES) $(RES)
releaseComp: $(COMP) $(TARGET) $(REF) $(RELEASE) $(FILES) $(RES)
debug: resGen debugComp
release: resGen releaseComp
